dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset constructed according to a model in which the signal is a superposition of a modality-specific effect, a condition-specific effect, and Gaussian noise. A total of 20 different images were generated, considering two different modality-specific signals and two different condition-specific signals, all randomly generated from a Gaussian distribution. Three versions of this dataset were created, with 10, 100, and 1000 voxels.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Datasets

dcterms:creator: M. V. Peelen
L. Fei-Fei
S. Kastner
dcterms:description: fMRI data collected to investigate object categorization during preparatory activity in a visual search experiment. The study involved 24 participants who performed tasks related to perception, imagery, and visual search, with stimuli consisting of images of people and cars.
dcterms:title: fMRI Dataset
